text:
“We were going to do something super big with them (@BTS_twt), but wth COVID-19 breaking out, it had to get canceled. I can’t say too much on that, but it was going be so amazing. Hopefully, after everything dies down...”

What was it, Ms. Lalau?!?!?! 🥺😭
